description: This file defines the interface IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. It declares four pure virtual methods that are intended to handle various events related to runtime management, window management, ripple events, and state changes, passing JSON data as arguments.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface that declares callback methods for handling different runtime and UI events.

methods.name: onRuntimeManagerEvent
methods.description: Handles runtime manager related events, receives event data as JSON.

methods.name: onWindowManagerEvent
methods.description: Handles window manager related events, receives event data as JSON.

methods.name: onRippleEvent
methods.description: Handles ripple events, takes a string name and event data as JSON.

methods.name: onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Handles state change events, receives event data as JSON.
